website_summaries.verdict: The Euro-style rollator from Drive Medical is definitely on the sleek and stylish side, and it's also rugged and easy to use. The braking system has a learning curve, but many users praise its overall maneuverability.
pros: Very easy to fold and maneuver
cons: Brakes are either on or off
Front wheels "toe out," creating balance issues
Heavy model can be difficult to load into vehicle

customer_reviews.title: Super great looking wheels, but One already broke
customer_reviews.text: Great set of wheels. Good brakes, and fairly lightweight. Provides the balance my relative needed to get around. Cup holders and small bag are just right for miscellaneous items. Had it since April. Right Front wheel now wobbles. Pieces of metal parts are coming out. I need to replace front wheel. For the top of the line rollater, this should not be breaking down after only 7 months when bring used by 96 year old.
customer_reviews.author: billskicker

customer_reviews.title: Can a Rollator Be Cool?
customer_reviews.text: It is a bad day when you have to consider getting one of these and your hair isn't even mostly gray yet. I have a combination of spinal issues, fibromyalgia, and mini-strokes that have forced me to acknowledge that, in some situations, I need one of these. But you know what? I found a kind of cool looking one! This rollator is nice-looking and works great. The seat is comfy. I don't need to use it most of the time, but when I do I am glad to have this one. I think it needs racing stripes, though. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Muneraven

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: A really beautiful, well made, sturdy walker. I love the color! I wanted something that didn't look like the standard walker. I wanted something more attractive. I buy nice coach purses, so I wanted something that looked more upscale. Maybe that is silly of me, but this walker really fits my needs, and if you want a well made, good looking walker, than this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great Walker, but very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Great Walker, but it is VERY heavy. It was beautiful, handled well and the seat was comfortable. The bag is a nice accessory too, but for me it was too heavy to load and unload from my vehicle. I had a feeling it was going to be, when I couldn't drag the box in the door. I had hoped it was heavy due to packaging, but that wasn't the case. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: michele boor

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Y the height was right on it is much more stable and it drives like a caddy. It also has been built for quality. Now I normally don't respond to these remote reviews but I felt compelled to. Now since my last review the frame on it had bent. I would like to know how I have to send it to get preferably to get a replacement or have it repaired. Since I am getting no response to my request I'm going to assume that your company is not going to do anything about my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cobb

customer_reviews.title: The wheels are not sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: When I unboxed this item it was a 5 star. After using it, I give it a one star. I bought this for my mother and after using it the wheels seemed to be loose so she could not use it. I am very disappointed in how the product works. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Thandi Blom

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Superb! Large wheels roll over uneven sideways and cobblestone with ease. Very easy to fold and unfold. Hard bottom seat with cushion is more comfortable than traditional sling canvas seats that can put pressure on sides of legs. Very sleek and durable high quality walker. Handles, legs, and wheels very stable while in use.
customer_reviews.author: RCS1611

customer_reviews.title: Great walker except for front wheels
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace both front wheels after only 10 months of moderate use by 93 YO. Loud clicking noise from wheels. Metal remains of bearing fell out when wheel was removed. No schematic with replacement wheels showing reassembly as to washers or proper torque.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Goes over bumpy terrain well (I live in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Goes over bumpy terrain well (I live in Arizona). If you have balance issues to boot, this will add stability. Didn't give it five stars due to it being fairly weighty at 22 pounds. I live alone so hoisting this in the back of my crossover vehicle is challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Babette

customer_reviews.title: Check for better product!
customer_reviews.text: After only 4 months the left front wheel bearing went out, only warranted for 60 days, 40 plus dollars to fix!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Looney

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, but cheap or defective parts!
customer_reviews.text: The seat has broken after 2 years!!!! Only used inside for a respite from standing! Looks great, comfortable but the plastic washer broke in half! Now the seat dips inward.
customer_reviews.author: day day

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Drive Nitro DLX, it arrived in less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Drive Nitro DLX, it arrived in less than 48hrs. Champagne / brown color is very classy. Out of the box...Ready to go! Very impressed with the overall quality of this product. Money very well spent . Update.... I often get stopped by individuals and they comment, “I have never seen one like that nice before” very satisfied with my Nitro DLX
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Garber

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY, HANDY WALKER
customer_reviews.text: Great Walker! My husband really likes the seat when he gets tired. He also carries drinks in the carry container. It is easy to adjust, and has no extraneous cords/wires to bother with. Even I can put it our car when we travel (in the trunk of our SUV). Would recommend this to anyone who has a need for a Walker! Note it was also useful when we attended the William Shattner show in Tucson.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fintzy

customer_reviews.title: ... and have never seen such a high quality and nice looking assistive device that is so strong and secure
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the physical therapy field 30 years and have never seen such a high quality and nice looking assistive device that is so strong and secure. This is amazing and I will buy one for every person I know who needs one.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Not accessible for people who need accessibility
customer_reviews.text: although the walker itself is very handsome looking, the very things that is boasted about are the same reasons why I returned it. If you need to use a walker, why would you put the basket in front over the front wheels? The bag is very hard to get off or put back on. The seat is not flat so cannot transport anything unless of course you want to pay more money and purchase a seat tray. The seat is very uncomfortable because of the way it folds. Absolutely do not like the back support strap---free advertising for vendor. If those things aren't important to you then it's a pretty sturdy walker. For me they were a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to look at, folds great, kind of heavy , not very strong wheels
customer_reviews.text: We just got this for my wife. It is gorgeous to look at, it folds easy, and it adjusts easily for height. The first test runs were annoying, because the front wheel assemblies bend when you try to change direction on carpets. It makes it hard to maneuver, and the engineer in me thinks they will break very quickly. Their large diameter make them easy to roll on carpeted surfaces, and over bumps, but they just are not rigid enough. For a cost of over $200, the wheels are just cheap crap, and don't belong on this rollator.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: not good. falling apart and not a yr old yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the expense!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colour, look, ease of folding it . But the biggest dislike and the thing that wanted me to return this item , is the weight. Its so heavy. My husband convinced me to keep it, he doesnt have trouble putting this roller in the car. I have to say its a smooth ride, it turns and glides really well. I would really recommend this roller, and the cost outweighs the comfort and stability of this roller.
customer_reviews.author: ukliz

customer_reviews.title: Be aware when purchasing. Read below.
customer_reviews.text: The walker is obviously an upgraded model. My only reservation, which is significant for me, is that it is very wobbly from side to side when varied pressure is placed on the different handles. This makes it very unstable for me. If actually needing to use this walker to allow you a lot of support in walking this may not be the walker for you.
customer_reviews.author: Connie F Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: The walker is a bit better at going over differing terrain/floor surfaces, in part b/c of its weight. But, I think it is a monster to get in and out of the trunk. Also, the seat is not comfortable. It's the best we could find, but still not great. I wish someone would actually design a walker that had all the features we are looking for (large tires, comfortable seat, secure place to store things, lifting seat to be able to get close to sinks/etc)!
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS WALKER,  I LOVE IT,,
customer_reviews.text: I call this my Little Mercedes. This walker is fabulous. It operates like a hot knife through butter!! The seat and back rest are wonderfully comfortable. It has gone through every doorway I have encountered. It collapses so easily and is not too heavy. The height was perfect right out of the box. And, by the way, it comes out of the box together and owners don't have to reconcile a puzzle. I LOVE IT!, The color is beautiful and the price is well worth it. I am really thrilled to have this and it does exactly what I need it for. Thank you Drive for this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Rolls like a Cadillac...I could move along as if I had no physical limitations and sit with comfort if short of breath, against a soft backrest, until ready to take off again. Also, as far as I am concerned, this company went the extra miles to make sure I got the walker on time before a planned trip that I considered cancelling without the option to use it rather than having to walk greater distances than I can with my cane...I get very short of breath with advancing scoliosis that is encroaching on my left lung...and ultimately may create cardio problems...THANKS FOR THE GREAT SERVICE!...I'm sure this walker will serve me well until I kick the bucket... (:-)))
customer_reviews.author: alamb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable, and handsome - love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy reliable walker provides great support. Easy to use, folds easily, and looks very handsome. I bought the cup holder which is very convenient and well made. The storage bag is perfect for most things. The seat is very comfortable and easy to stand up when you are ready to walk again. It looks like a sports accessory rather than a medical assist apparatus.
customer_reviews.author: Teller Forreal

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but build in China
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. It's better than other styles for getting through narrow places. I had a problem getting replacement parts to fix a friends. The parts weren't currently available, but a search of my favorite hardware store produced a near match for the missing METRIC bolt. Overall were satisfied, but they ask us to pay premium price and have it made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Nitro DLX Euro Style Walker by Drive is best rollator.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I call it my Jaquar. I get so many compliments on it, and am asked where I bought it. I do get inquiries, does Medicare pay for this type of rollator. I do not know because I had received their rollator which is the usual blue one. I found it so heavy, and hard to handle and my shoulders would hurt when I arrived home. The Nitro DLX is easy to handle, not heavy, and my shoulders do not ache after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica McDermott

customer_reviews.title: The most versatile, stylish and maneuverable walker I've witnessed.
customer_reviews.text: My mother is 89, a mover and fiercely independent. The last thing she wanted was a walker. I had originally investigated the 'petite' version but am glad I got her the bigger one. She is 5' tall, 105 pounds, minimal osteoporosis and good mobility. Buying the standard size gave her posture/stance a more upright and controlling/driving position. I have witnessed many elderly people hunched over their walkers, and I figured the less of that, the better. My mom agreed with my choice and she loves it. She gets a lot of compliments on the champagne color.
customer_reviews.author: fantail

customer_reviews.title: Good looking walker works on gravel driveway
customer_reviews.text: My 89-year-old father feels like the belle of the ball with this baby! He says all the ladies are going to be after him for his money with this fancy thing. I got it for him to use on his gravel driveway but it has now replaced his very nice 7 inch wheel model inside too. He LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarafloat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this. It is extremely sturdy and we've even been off roading. It does great on grass, but also on dirt paths, even through slot canyons! It has helped me get to so many places I would have otherwise never been able to reach on my own. Also great for carrying things, such as for carrying groceries into the house from the car. My small suitcase even once went on top of it. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the WORST SEAT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look, the easy fold, the stability and the maneuverability of this product. But one of the most important part of this product is the comfort of the seat that part is the WORST I HAVE EVER EXPERIENCED. THE SEAT IS SO HARD AND SO UNCOMFORTABLE I had to buy a cushion in order to be able to sit for any length of time. For the price of this product there is no way this seat was properly thought of it literally has hurt my back and my legs go numb, but i can’t afford to be without it, so i am making the best of a sorry situation.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Only for tall, strong people
customer_reviews.text: At 5'2", this rollator was far too big for me. When folded, it is really unruly. When folded, it tends to fall over which is really problematic. It I also far heavier than is practical. I'm a womyn on the roll is the mornings so I need an assistive device that makes life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Cj Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were searching for! My husband has been searching for a walker that did not have the break wires that get caught on things that he walks by. This walkers break wires are imbedded in the frame. It rolls very easily and improved his mobility. He has gotten compliments on his “Cadillac” every single day! The seat and back rest are comfortable. It folds opposite of most other walkers making it easy to set aside. It also stands upright for storage which makes it easy. No need to find a wall to prop it against. He is very happy with his decision to buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Jones

customer_reviews.title: The Drive Medical Nitro DLX walker has been a great help in aiding mobility
customer_reviews.text: The Drive Medical Nitro DLX walker has been a great help in aiding mobility. The large wheels roll easily over surface elevation changes. The easy fold and self standing makes use in public dining rooms or confined ares easy while keeping readily available for quick use. Quick adjustable handle height and fold makes transition from use to vehicle load and transport fast and easy. This has been a great investment and well worth the time spent comparing with other brands. Has also caused a lot of interest from others looking for a better form of walker aid.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: My 89 yo father can now walk upright and steady
customer_reviews.text: Greatest walker rollator I have ever seen. My 89 yo father can now walk upright and steady and look great doing so. He is the envy of his retirement home. Took him to brunch and the rollator folds easily and is lightweight enough for me to put in the back of my Subaru Forester and he used it as a seat at the table. No more problems with pulling out the chair and scooching it back in, the rollator glides into the perfect position. Now they just need a snazzier name than ‘walker rollator’.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Crepeau

customer_reviews.title: To Tell the Truth
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was enjoying all the good features of this walker UNTIL, on July 29 2000, while walking a wheel suddenly broke off, sending me to the ground with a broken humerous which resulted in more than seven weeks of home care, therapy and $5000 worth of expenses to date. Amazon replaced the item promptly. I actually requested a duplicate model, but you can never be too sure about anything, even if it is touted by others as "The Cadillac of Walkers" My Orthopedist says it could be six months or so before I can expect to return to normal. I am 95 yeawrs old
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mary

customer_reviews.title: envy of the facility
customer_reviews.text: My mom readily started using this unique walker and loves it. It is sturdy, well engineered, and attractive. She lives in an independent living facility and everyone comments on how cool it is. It costs more than most but I believe worth every penny for my mom's wellbeing and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: terrific improvements on a rollator.
customer_reviews.text: I love this walker with the larger wheels, the ability to change the height of the handgrips in a second, and the way it folds together and doesn't fall and the seat doesn't flap, like my other one does when folded for travel. It just works better than my older rolllator.
customer_reviews.author: K. Slater

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! So wonderful to be able to go for a walk again. This device provides stability and can handle paved trails beautifully. Natural trails are possible with this device if youre up for a workout and are prepared for the wear and tear on the rollator that would be a normal consequence of such use. Im having fun mall walking, touring local parks and meandering through my neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Post

customer_reviews.title: Best Rollator on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this Rollator. I can walk normally with it while I hobble in pain with just my cane. This is great looking and I receive many compliments on it. It is far better looking and working than any other “walker” on the market. The large wheels travel over uneven ground with ease. Everyone should have one of these. I’d like one in British Racing Green.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaschu

customer_reviews.title: Great looks high quality
customer_reviews.text: VERY impressed with this product. High quality, easy to adjust, being a younger guy with COPD wanted something that didn't look like my grandmother's walker or in powder blue or blinding red. I thought my friends would laugh at me but they thought it was great. Got my freedom back. Just put my oxygen concentrator (needed a longer canula ) in the pouch and I can walk faster and twice as far as before and can have a seat when I need to rest. It's a little heavy but that's what makes it so sturdy. I imagine the ones they make out of composite are lighter but I didn't want to spend that kind of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of walkers!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Cadillac of walkers. It is easy to maneuver, runs super smooth, and folds up with two fingers. It folds to about 10-12 inches wide. So once you arrive someplace, just pull up on the middle of the seat, and your Walker fits in snuggly, instead of being regular width. It's a blessing. Oh, it arrives fully assembled! No nuts or bolts to assemble. Just pop it out of the box. It also fits flat in the trunk. I'll never have a different walker again. This is wonderful ❤️.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedandcontent

customer_reviews.title: Classy Cadillac of a walker
customer_reviews.text: If you have to use a walker, this one is great! Besides being lightweight, it folds easily and the seat is relatively comfortable. It definitely gets the comments too! A couple of people saw mine and they ordered one for themselves. The brakes work so much better than on those cheaper walkers. Plus the larger front wheels in front make going over rougher terrain easier.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Drive Medical Nitro DLX Walker
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice, easy to roll and the way it folds where you don’t have to take the bag off is great. Also easy to get in an out of the trunk of car. It goes through al my doors to bedrooms, but my bathroom doors I have to close it to roll through those doors and open when I go to put on my makeup. Really pleased with the product. I’ve had all kinds of comments from people saying how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: This is great!!! So helpful to be able to head down the Mall and yet be able to sit down when back is tired. I got the water bottle holder attached also..........Super. I also like the carrier for my purse IN FRONT where I can watch it and get into it easily. Great Design
customer_reviews.author: Barbara V

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I thought. Doesn’t want to latch closed. Looks great. Good as a seat and nice e tea carry bag. Easy to adjust for height.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn russ

customer_reviews.title: Love the drive walkers
customer_reviews.text: Love the drive walkers. They work well and don't have cables all over like some walkers. The also fold flat which is wonderful when you're the one who has to get them in and out of the car. My only complaint is that the the seat (which is nice and soft) is not flat so you can't Se things on it to carry around. Needs a collapsible cup holder too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My 78 y/o mother loved this walker. The large front wheels are firm and easy to work with. The extra padding on the seat was a welcomed feature. Easy to fold and put away, wonderful design. Best walker she ever used (5) in 8 years (her words).
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Best walker around......
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Nitro Drive I have and love them. They are the best. Have room for things in the front basket and are very comfortable to sit on if you need to. And now with Co-Vid 19 I know I always have a clean seat wherever I go. They are heavier then many walkers but if I can lift and put in trunk I am sure most people can
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic if you have most of your balance.
customer_reviews.text: My father has difficulty walking. His legs don’t respond to his brain. This walker is too fast for him. He constantly has the brakes applied. Very dangerous for him since he leans on the walker to remain standing.
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: It fold up unexpectedly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now had this for six months and had several falls with it. It folds up when I lean more on on side than the other, then I fall. It does not appear to have a lock to keep it open when in use. I have MS so I jerk sometimes and can’t help it. I wish the manufacturers would contact me with a solution to this problem. PLEASE
customer_reviews.author: exan

customer_reviews.title: Best Walker Around!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our mom who lives in a senior community. This walker has changed her life. It’s stable and easy-to-use - especially with the larger wheels. It has allowed her mobility & independence. We’d never choose another.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Harrison

customer_reviews.title: My wife like this walker because it is steady enough that she ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife like this walker because it is steady enough that she feels safe using it, she also appreciates having the seat available if she gets tired. I appreciate how easily and flat it folds and how well it fits in the back of our Explorer, leaving plenty of room for other gear.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzer

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking beautiful blue walker
customer_reviews.text: I love the classy looking style of this walker. I call it my racing Nitro. It stands out with style and a beautiful electric blue color. It is easy to pull up with the handle that is located in center of seat, it is compact and easy for me to put in the back of my car. Which was very important to me to have ease of transporting my Nitro. I have RA and have problems with my hands and needed it to fit in my car without any difficulty maneuvering it. It is well built, the only problem I have noticed are the front wheels don't turn as quickly as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbox, get set and go.  It's all assembled for you.
customer_reviews.text: Unbox it and use it! All assembled. It is attractive not cheap looking. I love the way you can fold it to get through tight places and it still rolls easily folded. Good storage zip pouch and nice seat. I love my rollator and should have purchased it sooner. Great help to me anywhere I go. Also...it was boxed and protected very well. No bent or broken items.
customer_reviews.author: Disabledowl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel has already fell off and I can't fill out who to call to fix.
customer_reviews.author: scates

customer_reviews.title: The way this walker folds side to side makes it much more compact than the usual walker
customer_reviews.text: This is the most compact walker to fit into our car. When others see this, they say my husband has the Cadillac of walkers. The folding up from side to side is so important to keep it small enough to fit easily in our small car.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Yeah....not so nice......
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this walker but it is wrong for me. The seat is very tight and hard. The handles and brake handles are acquired to operate without cutting your fingers, something is very sharp there. It's all together just not suited for me. This is just my humble opinion and as always, Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: "Vwagon556"

customer_reviews.title: A More Compact Design
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Drive Nitro DLX Rollator since August of 2016. I like the design, shape and weight of it. It folds up more compact than other styles of rollators that I have. The front roller bearings have been replaced once and are in need of it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jarell Lankford

customer_reviews.title: Really helped with Black Friday
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have arthritis in my ankles and the pain gets so bad I have to go home because theres no where to sit. I received my walker 2 days before black friday and wow what a difference. while my sister was at a store I could sit on the seat and wait for her instead of trying to look for something to sit on. Its steady and really gives you confidence when you walk, no more cane for me. I love my walker. In dec were going around the neighborhood to look at xmas lights instead of driving.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Collie

customer_reviews.title: Folds easy and able to handle different terrain much better than ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 85 year old father who has back problems. Folds easy and able to handle different terrain much better than his standard rolling walker. This unit fits in car trunk and seat is comfortable for him. Also like the way the handles are easy to adjust for height.
customer_reviews.author: JohnC_FL

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive walker and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The Cadillac of walkers. This walker is everything written about it. I get many compliments and get asked where did I get it.
customer_reviews.author: vivian-e

customer_reviews.title: It's the Cadillac of walkers
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight easy to pick up and fold will go behind the car front seat also. It's very comfortable to sit on and my husband says the the brakes are very good. Everywhere we go every 1 asked about it some have got on the phone and ordered it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: large wheels, and heavy duty frame
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who has a C-4/C-5 incomplete spinal cord injury. The large wheels and ridged design allowed her to take it over grass and hard pack terrane. in other words she takes it off road!! Its heavier than others, but that is why its so ridged and able to down to our lake.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Riggins

customer_reviews.title: A handsome and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this rollator and what a great product this is. I searched for over a week before choosing this one and I am truly pleased with the quality of this one. There are so many of these out there for less cost, but I am a believer in that you get what you pay for and I could not be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Lose screw
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with a lose screw on the left handlebar, I tried to tight it in, but I couldn't. I'm worry the handle will come lose while my father is using the stroller, any suggestion?
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Velez-Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Two days quick ship
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend exactly what they wanted. This was for a 94 year old lady who had one that was old and it broke. She called and was in a panic and needed one now. She found this on Amazon and asked me if I had an account. I said yes and found the one she needed. Ordered it and got it right on time. Thanks so much for being there for us. The lady loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Line!
customer_reviews.text: This walker is so wonderful! You can stand straight up when you walk and causes no strain on a sore back! I am short though, can not say how straight you can stand if you all tall. It is well made and easy to use. I would another if need be. Pretty too if that is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Manny

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say enough about it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about it!!!! Drive Walkers are the best, but this is one, is the best of the best!! My mother gets compliments on the walker every where she goes. Which surprisingly makes her more likely to use it.
customer_reviews.author: kc707

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent walker! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent walker! Worth every penny, comes completely assembled, good to go right out of the box. Purchased this walker for my husband who is recovering from foot surgery and just needs to build strength in his balance and his gait. The cane he uses always seems to make him take steps less confidently and now with this walker, he can walk tall and strong as he regains his mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love this walker
customer_reviews.text: Love this walker. Have been able to walk faster with balance control in the parks so really appreciate this walker. Very comfortable for sitting also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp & Snappy!!
customer_reviews.text: Folks are always asking me where I go it. It's sharp looking, it allows me to walk straight instead of bending over and I can take a rest when I'm feeling tired. Just got back from a Chicago vacation and was able to walk 4 miles the first day because of this fabulous "helper"!! Works on grass beautifully too. It's heavy but so easy to fold and manage getting it in to the trunk of my car. My husband usually does it but I can manage it too when I have to. I'm going to order a cup holder for my water bottle! Love my walker!!
customer_reviews.author: Lela Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Mercedes of walkers
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law loves this walker. Highly maneuverable, stable, and has great storage. This walker is heavy and takes some strength to load into a vehicle, but thats not a big issue. She calls it her "Mercedes Walker" and is the nicest one at her group home.
customer_reviews.author: Bike Giant

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This walker is stylish, very functional, and I like the idea of the cables not showing. The champagne color is classy and everyone who sees it likes it. So far I've had it for one day and don't see a problem with it now; and I hope I never so.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Out  of Options
customer_reviews.text: Used walker in my bedroom as my 2nd one but it fell breaking the plastic connecting to the front wheels, it used to be metal. Some of the pictures show old design. I need a replacement but I cannot buy a walker designed to break. I do not understand why Driver changed a winning formula. It may translate in more purchases short term but not long term. My disability is physical not mental or financial.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Mom's freedom
customer_reviews.text: My mom cannot see very well but now she goes way faster than I can. She almost runs over people. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Denning

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it would travel well on uneven terrain, and it does
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of admiring looks and comments. When I first used at hospital the nurses referred to as the “Cadillac” walker It is heavy when you lift to store for travel
customer_reviews.author: bob herron

customer_reviews.title: The walker is very easy to set up and works very well as the description says.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this walker and would recommend it to any one that needs a walker for any reason, also to change the height of the handels is very easy and the whole concept of this walker is worth investing in..Check it out I think you will really like it, also one of the most attractive walkers I have ever seen and not so old fashioned like other brands. This walker rolls very smoothly and is easy to handle. I am 70 years with balance issues and I like the look of it and like the way it works with also the ability of a seat to sit in when there is none available.
customer_reviews.author: Very happy camper !

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy walker
customer_reviews.text: This Walker is sturdy. The only thing is, it’s heavier than most other walkers. I had to get a lightweight aluminum walker to keep in my car because this one is too heavy for me to lift up into the back of my SUV. I really like it for around the house though. I leave it by my bed at night and use it to help me get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda J. McCarley

customer_reviews.title: That compared to other rollaters it is very heavy
customer_reviews.text: this product is expensiv, yet so heavy at 22 it’s that my daughter had trouble lifting it in and out of her car. we got one at more than $110.- less that weighed just 14 i s. in addition, the seat is not flat precluding the placement of anything there, as if you do it simply slides off right away. obviously, the product is very attractive, but that is no help.
customer_reviews.author: Bodil

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy, attractive and useful
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy, attractive and useful.. Problem is Couldn't lift it to put it in the car.It is when I am on uneven sidewalks, parking lots etc. that this would have been useful but...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better maintain it
customer_reviews.text: My mother has had this unit for a little less than a year and bolts are falling off and the storage bag is ripping. Was a great unit but now i need to try and find bolts that fit and a new bag. Drive Medical asked for a bunch of information as if they would help then said not covered by warranty. So if you buy, nothing at all heavy in the bag and tighten all the bolts on a regular basis else someone may get hurt. Oh and a replacement bag is $80.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: No more bending over
customer_reviews.text: Ever see people half bent over their walker? How about the "walkers" with tennis ball covers on two of the legs - who came up with that piece of junk? The Rollator we purchased allows the user to walk and stand with the correct posture - an excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: I feel I got the Cadillac of Rollators.
customer_reviews.text: Love the stability and looks. The back rest is very comfortable while sitting. I use it mostly to walk longer distances outside. Glad I got the beverage holder too. It folds very well. Haven't put it in my car yet, so I don't know its weight. Expecting it to be no problem. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Think again if you need to carry any  heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good Walker. The only problem I have is there no bag that you can carry an oxygen tank with . The carrying bag that comes with it is not a heavy duty one.
customer_reviews.author: thela clark

customer_reviews.title: A great walker, but a little heavy when lifting into my car.
customer_reviews.text: I like the walker very much. I would like the basket to be a little wider going backwards to fit larger things in. For me the walker is to heavy for me to lift into the back of my SUV. I may get a lighter one also for when I drive to a store, but I will use this walker for inside use. Otherwise I still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: WORKS OUT WELL IN MY WALKING REHABILITATION EFFORTS
customer_reviews.text: VERY STURDY AND EFFECTIVE IN MY REHABITATION EFFORTS TO REGAIN ABILITY TO WALK AFTER BOTH KNEES BEING REPLACED AND SEVERAL STROKES-- PHYSICAL THERAPHIST SAYS HE IS VERY IMPRESSED!!
customer_reviews.author: walter armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Lovely yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first rollator and I love it. I wanted a sturdy piece of equipment, as me staying upright is pretty important. I feel secure on sidewalks, parking lots and even grass. Easily glides with no wobbling. Beautiful classy color.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia l. dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: Best walker ever made
customer_reviews.text: This walker is amazing. My his loves this and it is so easy to maneuver. So easy to fold up and compact. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: robert babbt

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Drive Nitro
customer_reviews.text: This model is wonderful with the hard seat. The color is nice for a change. I would purchase this walker again. Enjoy the smooth ride and sturdy seat. Folds up better than most others.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stone

customer_reviews.title: Nifty looking; not likely to be mistaken for anyone else's rollator
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I bought it. Big wheels make it less maneuverable in tight spaces. Folds easily, but when folded, sides get scraped up. Folding with inflexible item (like folding cane) in bag is impossible, unless you remove the bag. Front-hanging bag folds with walker; will break glass on iPads. Incredibly difficult to reinsert the bag back and lock it in place. Another minus; bag has no carry strap. Material on bottom of bag develops permanent crease when folded a few tims. I suspect it will cause a hole in the mesh shortly. Right brake no longer works and won't tighten any more; cable seems bunched up at bottom contact point.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H. Kelson

customer_reviews.title: A great walker to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable walkers I have had in the twenty years that I had used walkers.It is very easy to fold up and it glides across the floor in my home with me barely touching it. I will most definitely buy another walker from this company when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Roundtree

customer_reviews.title: Great walker
customer_reviews.text: My 93 year old mother gets around a lot better with this walker then the one she got from medical supply. Much easier to get in and out of car!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Everywhere my wife goes with this walker, people stop her to ask about it. They are so attracted to it for its ease of use AND its attractiveness. Most say they have never seen one like it followed by “where did you get it”. We always direct them to Amazon because it would probably not have fit our budget otherwise. We are very pleased with our Drive Rollator.
customer_reviews.author: Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Great Walker to use
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband and he likes how it works. We especially like how it folds up. The swivel wheels on the front make it easier to move. The only down side is that it is heavier than his previous walkers. Many people who see it as we go about are always making comments on how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Spera

customer_reviews.title: ... to worry about it braking at the wrong time like my old rollator
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were a bit lighter but at least I don't ever have to worry about it braking at the wrong time like my old rollator. This is built very well and nothing on it looks cheap and the set is very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A walker with style
customer_reviews.text: I like its appearance, but I find that it is because of its additional weight compared to the lesser deluxe model it is more difficult to load into a car. Perhaps for a 84 plus adult loading the walker into a car is less easy.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Church

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. It is great and easy to handle. It let me in and out of tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Rose

customer_reviews.title: So much better that my first one
customer_reviews.text: and my first walker was great, but this one is so much easier to manage, and lots more enjoyable when walking my Scottie!
customer_reviews.author: MARY LAMB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The DLX is a bit heavier than the standard, so it's harder to store in the trunk, but it's an excellent product. Takes less room than other types of rolling walkers.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding. Exceeds My Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Folks, if you are in-the-market for a walker, this one should not be overlooked. Everything about it is "Prime." It is exactly as described and more. Attention to detail and brakes are exceptional. Take a ride on this "bad boy" and you will never look back. Great "price point" at $200 bucks as well. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Superior to most walkers. Very secure
customer_reviews.text: Superior piece of equipment. Very stable This is our second. Brake cable broke but we hope to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Frazer

product_meta.title: Drive Medical Nitro DLX Euro Style Walker Rollator, Champagne
product_meta.description: Color:ChampagneIf you're seeking a safe, convenient aid to improving your daily mobility, a rollator can be the ideal solution. Wheels make a rollator a superior option over a standard walker, eliminating the need to lift the device and allowing you to walk with an easy, smooth gait. Plus, rollators are better for traveling over uneven, outdoor terrain, making them great for your active, busy lifestyle. And with the built-in seat found on a rollator, you'll always have a convenient place to rest. Featuring a revolutionary design and eye-catching style, the nitro dlx has exploded onto the rollator scene. The nitro's caster fork design allows for an enhanced turning radius while the 10" front casters allow optimal steering and rolling comfort. In addition, the nitro dlx locates brake cables within the unit's frame for safety and offers quick and easy tool-free adjustment to the handle height and back support. Plus, the nitro dlx has a firm, sturdy, and durable seat that separates in the middle to allow the nitro dlx to easily fold to ultra-compact size for storage or transport.
feature_bullets: Attractive, euro-style design; 10 inch front casters allow excellent steering and rolling comfort
Easily folds with one hand to ultra-compact size for storage; cross-brace design allows for side-to-side folding and added stability
Durable and comfortable firm seat separates allowing unit to fold
Handsome and removable deluxe zippered storage bag with unique attachment to keep bag securely in place when nitro is open or folded
Overall dimensions: 28 inch(l) x 24 inch(w) x 33.5 inch(h); seat dimensions: 10.75 inch(d) x 18 inch(w) x 20 inch(h); handle height: 33.5 inch-38.5 inch; weight capacity: 300 lbs
Back support height easily adjusts with tool-free thumb screw
Caster fork design enhances turning radius

Attractive, euro-style design; 10 inch front casters allow excellent steering and rolling comfort^Easily folds with one hand to ultra-compact size for storage; cross-brace design allows for side-to-side folding and added stability^Durable and comfortable firm seat separates allowing unit to fold^Handsome and removable deluxe zippered storage bag with unique attachment to keep bag securely in place when nitro is open or folded^Overall dimensions: 28 inch(l) x 24 inch(w) x 33.5 inch(h); seat dimensions: 10.75 inch(d) x 18 inch(w) x 20 inch(h); handle height: 33.5 inch-38.5 inch; weight capacity: 300 lbs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
